name: Île Flottante aux Fraises
description: Light and fluffy floating islands with a vibrant strawberry coulis, perfect for a summer dessert.

components.name: Strawberry Meringues
instructions: Mix the eggs and sugar without beating too much.
Bring the cream and milk to a boil and combine the two mixtures.

components.name: Crème Anglaise
instructions: Heat the milk to 183°F (84°C) and slowly pour over the mixed egg yolks and sugar, whisking constantly.
Return the mixture to the heat and stir until it thickens.

components.name: Sugar Caramel Strands
instructions: Heat the sugar and water until caramelized.
Carefully pour onto a silicone mat and let harden.
